sentences.en: "Well, dear," her hostess would reply with a frigid smile.
sentences.cn: “噢，亲爱的，”她的女主人会笑容僵硬地回答。

sentences.en: A snowstorm hit the West today, bringing with it frigid temperatures.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪今天袭击了西部地区，导致气温骤降。

sentences.en: Apparently the men had fallen asleep before the frigid chill had finally penetrated their coverings.
sentences.cn: 很明显,在严寒最后穿透这些人身上的覆盖物之前,他们已经睡着了.

sentences.en: Frigid gusts were driving swells in past the mole.
sentences.cn: 寒风阵阵掀起大浪涌过防波堤.

sentences.en: Frigid winds blew from the north.
He presided at all councils of ministers, where the atmosphere could be frigid on occasions.
sentences.cn: 所有的内阁会议都由他主持，有时会上的气氛会很拘谨。

sentences.en: If Catherine had been frigid the night before, today she was haughty.
sentences.cn: 如果说昨天晚上凯瑟琳举止僵硬的话, 今天晚上可以说是态度傲慢.

sentences.en: Never in its history had this street witnessed so frigid and desolate a New Year season.
sentences.cn: 自从有这条街以来,从没见过这样冷落凄凉的年关!

sentences.en: She returned his smile with a frigid glance.
sentences.cn: 对他的微笑她报以冷冷的一瞥.

sentences.en: She was so frigid at that time that she almost committed suicide.
sentences.cn: 当时她非常心灰意冷,差点自杀.

sentences.en: Temperatures in this swamp environment apparently can be cool but not frigid.
sentences.cn: 在沼泽环境中的气候显然是凉爽的而不是寒冷的.

sentences.en: The character of the pine and cypress is shown in frigid winter ; the sincerity of one's friend is shown in adverse circumstances.
sentences.cn: 岁寒知松柏,患难见交情.

sentences.en: The guard looked at us with a frigid stare.
The mustache spread in Slote's old frigid grin.
sentences.cn: 斯鲁特那两撇胡子伸展开,露出了从前那种淡淡的笑容.

sentences.en: There was a frigid atmosphere in the room.
sentences.cn: 房间里一片冷淡的气氛。

sentences.en: They felt awkward, and once more assumed their frigid bearing.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得很窘, 又把冷冰的面孔摆出来.

trans.tran_cn: 寒冷的，极冷的，冷漠的，（尤指女人）性冷淡的
trans.tran_en: a woman who is frigid does not like having sex
